alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:24PM MDT until July 19 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN GOSHEN AND EAST CENTRAL PLATTE COUNTIES... At 423 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chugcreek, or near Wheatland, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Chugcreek, Lakeview North, Bordeaux, Y-O Ranch and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 70 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
